org.grouplens.lenskit.slopeone

Class SlopeOneModelBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.slopeone.SlopeOneModelBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.inject.Provider<SlopeOneModel>

    public class SlopeOneModelBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.inject.Provider<SlopeOneModel>
    Pre-computes the deviations and number of mutual rating users for every pair of items and stores the results in a DeviationMatrix and CoratingMatrix. These matrices are later used by a SlopeOneItemScorer.
